feed.title: 飘逸的肉猪
feed.subtitle: 一个苦逼程序员的日常

entry.title: iOS runtime
entry.content:
方法交换

#import "UINaviationController+MethodExchange.h"
#import <objc/runtime.h>
@implementation UINaviationController (MethodExchange)
- (void)load {
    static dispatch_once_t onceToken;
    dispatch_once(&onceToken, ^{
        Class class = [self class];
        method_exchangeImplementations(class_getInstanceMethod(class, @selector(pushViewController:animated:)), class_getInstanceMethod(class, @selector(mmpushViewController:animated:)));
    });
}
- (void)mmpushViewController:(UIViewController *)viewController animated:(BOOL)animated {
    if (self.viewControllers.count == 1) {
        [viewController setHidesBottomBarWhenPushed:YES];
    }
    [self mmpushViewController:viewController animated:animated];
}

entry.title: 开始吧 骚年
entry.content:
以前一直想弄一个自己的blog来着,一直都没时间(其实是自己太懒),今天抽空决定搞一个起来.
一来可以在上面记录一下自己工作中遇到的问题
二来嘛,听说作为一个程序猿,没有一个自己的博客是件很丢脸的事情.
关于这个博客的文章质量嘛,大家纯属看热闹吧.
先mark一下MD的基本语法…

Markdown 也允许你偷懒只在整个段落的第一行最前面加上>:

This is a blockquote with two paragraphs. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet,consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aliquam hendrerit mi posuere lectus.Vestibulum enim wisi, viverra nec, fringilla in, laoreet vitae, risus.

Donec sit amet nisl. Aliquam semper ipsum sit amet velit. Suspendisse id sem consectetuer libero luctus adipiscing.

区块引用可以嵌套(例如:引用内的引用),只要根据层次加上不同数量的>:

This is the first level of quoting.

This is nested blockquote.

Back to the first level.

引用的区块内也可以使用其他的 Markdown 语法,包括标题、列表、代码区块等:

##这是一个标题.

  1. 这是第一行列表项。
  2. 这是第二行列表项。

给出一些例子代码：
return shell_exec(“echo $input | $markdown_script”);

h1标签

This is an H1
=============

h2标签

This is an H2
-------------

无序列表 - + *用法一致:

  • ------------

    <代码写在这里>

  • ++++++++++++

    <代码写在这里>

  • ************

    <代码写在这里>

有序列表 数字 1或2或3(不影响html输出) 后面跟一个英文的点 . :

  1. Bird
  2. McHale

  3. Parish

    1. Bird
    2. McHale
    3. Parish

等同于:

<ol>
<li>Bird</li>
<li>McHale</li>
<li>Parish</li>
</ol>

h标签:

* 这是h1
    # h1
* 这是h2
    ## h2
* 这是h3
    ### h3

这是一个普通段落:

这是一个代码区块。

Here is an example of AppleScript:

tell application "Foo"
    beep
end tell

超链接:

  1. This is an example inline link.
  2. This link has no title attribute.
  3. This is an example reference-style link.
  4. See my About page for details.

链接样式:

I get 10 times more traffic from Google than from Yahoo or MSN.

I get 10 times more traffic from [Google] [1] than from [Yahoo] [2] or [MSN] [3].

[1]: http://google.com/        "Google"
[2]: http://search.yahoo.com/  "Yahoo Search"
[3]: http://search.msn.com/    "MSN Search"

行内样式:

I get 10 times more traffic from Google than from Yahoo or MSN.

I get 10 times more traffic from [Google](http://google.com/ "Google") than from [Yahoo](http://search.yahoo.com/ "Yahoo Search") or [MSN](http://search.msn.com/ "MSN Search").

加粗

**文字**

斜体字

__文字__

如果要标记一小段行内代码，你可以用反引号把它包起来（` ），例如: Use the printf() function.

Use the `printf()` function.

http://example.com/
